title: 7 Health Benefits of Paddle Sports
author: McKay Gorse
description: Canoeing, paddle boarding, kayaking and rowing all offer great health benefits as well as an afternoon of fun. Check out these 7 great health benefits of paddle sports:
cleaned_text: and rowing all offer great health benefits as well as an afternoon of fun. Check out these 7 great health benefits of paddle sports: Ever wanted to walk on water? Hop on a paddle board and you're almost there! Not confident in your balancing skills? Canoeing, kayaking and rowing all offer the same health benefits while not requiring as much coordination.
